players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the detective. Diana is mafioso. Be cautious."
You: "Thanks Charlie, keeping an eye on Diana."
Diana: "I'll watch Diana closely. Stay vigilant."
You: "Voting for Bob, he seemed suspicious last night."
Charlie: "Will watch Diana and Bob. Stay alert."
Diana: "Watching Diana and Bob closely. Stay alert."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob

memory: You're Charlie, the detective.

Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.

Alice: "Voting for Bob, he seemed suspicious last night."

Diana: "Watching Diana and Bob closely. Stay alert."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the detective. Diana is mafioso. Be cautious."
Alice: "Thanks Charlie, keeping an eye on Diana."
You: "I'll watch Diana closely. Stay vigilant."
Alice: "Voting for Bob, he seemed suspicious last night."
Charlie: "Will watch Diana and Bob. Stay alert."
You: "Watching Diana and Bob closely. Stay alert."
